Description:
Detects the execution of certutil with certain flags that allow the utility to download files from file-sharing websites.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious File Downloaded From File-Sharing Website Via Certutil.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%urlcache %' or command like '%verifyctl %') and (command like '%.githubusercontent.com%' or command like '%anonfiles.com%' or command like '%cdn.discordapp.com%' or command like '%ddns.net%' or command like '%dl.dropboxusercontent.com%' or command like '%ghostbin.co%' or command like '%glitch.me%' or command like '%gofile.io%' or command like '%hastebin.com%' or command like '%mediafire.com%' or command like '%mega.nz%' or command like '%onrender.com%' or command like '%pages.dev%' or command like '%paste.ee%' or command like '%pastebin.com%' or command like '%pastebin.pl%' or command like '%pastetext.net%' or command like '%privatlab.com%' or command like '%privatlab.net%' or command like '%send.exploit.in%' or command like '%sendspace.com%' or command like '%storage.googleapis.com%' or command like '%storjshare.io%' or command like '%supabase.co%' or command like '%temp.sh%' or command like '%transfer.sh%' or command like '%trycloudflare.com%' or command like '%ufile.io%' or command like '%w3spaces.com%' or command like '%workers.dev%') and (process_path like '%\certutil.exe' and original_file_name = 'certutil.exe'))
